News.headline: Loan Update: 9th January
News.short_description: Updates on Daggers loan players Shepherd, Barnwell and Assombalonga
News.description:
Defender Jimmy Shepherd played the full 90 minutes on his third game for Billericay Town, suffering his first defeat of his loan spell with the club as Billericay Town lost the game 2-1 away to Bognor Regis Town FC on Saturday.

Forward Shomari Barnwell played the full 90 minutes as Bishop’s Stortford won 3-0 away to Margate FC as the club overtook their opponents in the Vanarama National League South table, going up to 21st in the table.

Finally Chris Assombalonga was an unused substitute as St Albans City ended a three match losing run, drawing 2-2 with National League South leaders Maidenhead United at home on Saturday, coming from 2-0 down to get the result.
